content.webTitle: How many Stradivarius violins are still being played?

fields.headline: How many Stradivarius violins are still being played?
fields.bodyText: Many of the most famous violinists seem to play Stradivarius violins. How many of these instruments are there still being played, and how involved was Antonio Stradivari personally in their production – or did they come out of a workshop under his name? Pauline Gaunt Post your answers – and new questions – below or email them to nq@theguardian.com
